attributes.action: pursue a global olympic games EVERY year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Each time the olympic games comes around, it seems that there isn't enough time to cover all sports, therefore requiring some lesser known sports to be dropped, replaced or not even included in a shortlist.

Therefore I am petitioning for the government to campaign internationally for an olympic games every year in order to cover these lesser known sports. They can be cycled around every year in order to cover everyones "cup of tea".

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
